ingredients: 2 russet potatoes, about 8 oz. total, &nbsp peeled and cut into large pieces
Salt, to taste, plus 3/4 tsp. salt
1 cup fresh smooth-ground corn masa for &nbsp tortillas, or 1 cup powdered masa harina &nbsp mixed with 1/2 cup plus 2 Tbs. warm water
1 cup fresh smooth-ground corn masa for &nbsp tortillas, or 1 cup powdered masa harina &nbsp mixed with 1/2 cup plus 2 Tbs. warm water
1 1/2 tsp. balsamic vinegar, plus more as &nbsp needed (optional)
3/4 cup fresh salsa, such as red chili-tomatillo &nbsp salsa
2 generous cups loosely packed torn herb &nbsp leaves, such as watercress, arugula, mizuna &nbsp and/or basil
About 1 cup crumbled goat cheese (chèvre), &nbsp ricotta salata or Mexican queso añejo
